description: A studio course for the student with previous acting experience. Through scene and monologue work students explore text and character analysis as well as the requirements of major theatrical period styles. Students perform regularly throughout the semester. The course requires trips to professional theaters in the Twin Cities. A ticket fee is required. Prerequisites: Theater 110 or 180, and 130 or 131. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Intermediate Acting
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Theater 110 or 180, and 130 or 131. Offered annually in the spring semester.
